TopicTitle: Can anyone show me the way to SelectRoot?

Articles.Content: Ive been looking for the past half hour now and this mod has seemed to disappear off the face of the Earth. Nothing on spaceport ( as if ), and no forums searches could come up with anything. So does anyone have a version that works with .22? ( Ive yet to update yet due to a pending mission. )

This one?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43208-0-22-Oct17-SelectRoot-Set-a-new-root-part-0-22-fixes

Protip: Google search for "forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com item to search for". Dead matches for mods, every time.
Thanks I appreciate it. Ill keep that in mind.

This one?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43208-0-22-Oct17-SelectRoot-Set-a-new-root-part-0-22-fixes

Protip: Google search for "forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com item to search for". Dead matches for mods, every time.

I usually dont even need that much....I just do "kerbal [search item]" ... without the quotes or brackets of course...

That way I usually get items from three sources at once to choose from: Spaceport, the Forums, and Youtube for vids...

I usually dont even need that much....I just do "kerbal [search item]" ... without the quotes or brackets of course...

That way I usually get items from three sources at once to choose from: Spaceport, the Forums, and Youtube for vids...

Technically, I only use "KSPF" followed by whatever I'm looking for. I have a custom search engine set up to automatically search the forums using that key. For Spaceport, it's just "KSP", though I rarely need to use it, because Google is smart enough to hand me Spaceport links if it runs out of forums matches if I'm looking for mod names and such.
